name: The Last Seed (Unnamed Collection, marcagotchi, elcoms)
name_original: The Last Seed (Unnamed Collection, marcagotchi, elcoms)
description:
By Chu Rui Heng, Elcoms Khang Jun De, and Joshua Marc Lee Chun Loong

The Last Seed is a roguelike survival shoot-em-up made for 2 Buttons Game Jam.  Inspired by Vampire Survivors and 20 Minutes Til Dawn. Play as the final seedling of the World Tree, the tree that gives life to all forms of being except the parasitic moss bugs. By being exposed to sunlight for 10 minutes, the seedling will be able to sprout and emerge as the successor of the World Tree and restore life to the world.

Controls:
P1: Left, Right
P2: A, D (In development)
Pressing a button twice makes the seedling dash in that direction.

Disclaimer: This project is not yet completed. Some power-up abilities in the game are not in effect yet (Seed Bomb, Vine Whip, Moonblast, Fairy Chill). Local multiplayer mode is still under development ;)

BGM Music by Dima Koltsov
